CustomField.description: Bill of Material Button in Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c >0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Closed(not won)')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c , 'Expired'))) ,IF(AND (NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', NOT(ISPICKVAL(NokiaCPQ_Portfolio__c , 'Modular Private Wireless Solution'))),( $CustomMetadata.CPQ_XAEApps__mdt.BOM.CPQ_AppUrl__c +Id),IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM',( $CustomMetadata.CPQ_XAEApps__mdt.BOM_MPW.CPQ_AppUrl__c +Id),null)),null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Bill of Material Button in Quote Actions Lightning Component
CustomField.label: Bill of Material Button Field
